title: ISic020435. ISic020435
body:
Facsimile Images

[---]τιαιεμ[---]μ̣ι

Apparatus criticus

Text after Agostiniani 2021 (IAS I, App.). ; Calascibetta: τιαιεμ ; Falsone: [---]τιαιεμ[---]

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

The editor, L. Agostiniani, rightly invites a comparison with the inscription ISic020368 ]κυτιαιεμ[, from Grotta Vanella, which makes this text very problematic. The editor suggests that it may be an epigraphic forgery.

bibliography

  • Agostiniani 2021 435 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002320
  • Agostiniani 1992 1, note 7 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002312
  • Calascibetta 1990 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001408
  • Agostiniani 1988-1989 345, note 1 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002311
  • Falsone 1988-1989 311 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002310
